lib.jog

Class audio.Music

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.jog.audio.Music
  • Enclosing class:
    audio

    public static class audio.Music
extends java.lang.Object

    jog.audio.Music

    Essentially an object-orientated wrapper for the slick Music object.

    Author:
    IMP1

      • audio.Music

        private audio.Music(java.lang.String filepath,
           boolean stream,
           boolean looping)
        Constructor for a music source.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path to the audio file.
        stream - whether to load the music as it's playing.
        looping - whether to loop the music.
